Fields.DialogueText: Ganz genau! Get out of my face! You know you're wrong! Idiot...
Oh, I do find your affection for yelling so entertaining.
Was that sarcastic? You usually hate it when I yell, but you sounded like you actually meant it...
I don't know, I guess it's growing on me.
That's not weird to say at all. That would be like me saying I've developed an appreciation of those times you talk with your mouth full of food.

Fields.MenuText: I think it's just the dichotomy of someone as pretty as you yelling as loud as you do. It's striking.
Your yelling just shows how much passion you have for your work.
I don't talk with food in my mouth... that often.

Fields.DialogueText: Ich? Hübsch? What a ridiculous notion!
Oh? Ja, I could see that.
Schon klar, Kapitän...
If I'm being honest, Hannah, I like most things about you.
Including my ability to sense Nixen from long range?
Including that.
Ah, I see. Prepare for battle!
@BATTLE
Whoa, Hannah! Where'd you get all that money from?
A lot of people wanted to donate to the DGzRS.
Did you get that money honestly?
You think I... what? Swindled the money off the people?

Fields.MenuText: For the DGzRS, yes, I think it's within the realm of possibility.
I don't know... it's just a lot of money!
Absolutely not! I was just surprised, that's all.

Fields.DialogueText: The methods I used weren't entirely candid... but I didn't swindle anyone!
Wohl wahr! An almost suspiciously large amount of money.
Oh, Kapitän. So quick to doubt your gut instincts.
So wait... what did you do?
I can't hear you over the sound of the Nixen attacking our ship! Prepare for battle, Kapitän!
@BATTLE
Kapitän! There are Nixen coming from the port side!
Good looking out, Hannah! Get ready, everyone!
@BATTLE
That was a pretty tough battle, even if it didn't seem that bad.
Hm, I've been in tougher situations.
Like when?
My entire life has been one big battle, Kapitän. Ha!
You know, your jokes have a dark edge to them.
Ach komm schon. Everyone appreciates a bit of subversive humor, now and then.

Fields.MenuText: I guess... I just wonder how much truth there is to the jokes you make.
I actually like puns a lot better. They're too funny!
Personally, I like some cheesy knock–knock jokes. The stupider, the better!

Fields.DialogueText: It's best not to overthink things, Kapitän.
Puns? They aren't even remotely clever. Aim a little higher, Kapitän.
Oh, Kapitän...
This isn't a matter of what I like, though! I just want to make sure you're all right.
Wer weiß, Kapitän... Wer weiß...
Hallo Käpt'n! 'n Bierchen?
I think I'll pass on that. Is everything all right?
Mhm... quite all right.
Can you tell me what you're thinking about?
I've been thinking about what you said about my jokes. I know I can be zynisch. But this world can be a zynischer place - it isn't a Zuckerschlecken.

Fields.MenuText: Well, that's not a very good outlook to have! You need to have some optimism in life. Otherwise, what's the point?
That's a fair point, Hannah.
I came to terms with that a long time ago. Sometimes it's better to just live in denial, Hannah.

Fields.DialogueText: Exactly, what's the point?
Willkommen in meiner Welt!
It's impossible to be ignorant once you've realized how grausam the world is!
Heh, you know, you just sound ridiculous. Lighten up!
Hör mal...
I know, I know. "The world is a dark and horrible place." But shouldn't you desire happiness? To smile once in a while?
I smile... well, grin is probably more accurate.
Think you can grin and bear another Morgana battle?
Jederzeit, Käpt'n.
@BATTLE
Kapitän! I've really been thinking about what you said to me before...
What in particular? We talk quite a bit, Hannah.
About how I just need to live life and forget about how stupid and grausam the world is.
Ah, yes... hold on just a second! There's a group of Morganas coming in fast! We need to take care of them first!
@BATTLE
Whew... well, now that they're gone, what were you saying?
I've decided to delve more into my interests in search for happiness. And I was hoping I could encourage you to do the same. What do you like to do?

Fields.MenuText: Well... captain ships?
I could climb a mountain. Or maybe drive a race car!
I don't think I want to try anything new. I'm not comfortable with that.

Fields.DialogueText: Well, you had little choice in that matter.
That might be a little too much. Maybe something we actually have the resources to do?
Now you're just lazy!
Do you have any ideas?
I have a few. Komm mit! I'll tell you about them, but not out here. People could be listening.
What? Why does that matter?
Just come with me!
Bist du bereit?
No... Can you explain to me exactly what we're doing again?
We're going to get rid of the rats in the Fettkeller.
Rats? How many rats are down here exactly?
Hm... I guess we'll see. Ich habe Köder ausgelegt. In fact, I think they're gathering as we speak.
Hannah... that's a lot of rats. A LOT of rats! Let's get out of here.
I'd only ever seen two or three at a time, but I had no idea there were that many! Au weia...
So can we agree that this was a bad idea?
Na schön, na gut. Do you have any brilliant ideas?

Fields.MenuText: We should give the rats one more try, now that we're prepared!
Why do we have to do anything else? Aren't the diseases we're probably going to get from those rats enough?
We could always build something.

Fields.DialogueText: Hast du s'e noch alle? You can go back in there, but I'm staying out here! Maybe should just build something.
While quarantine would be quite the experience, it doesn't have the fun aspect I was looking for. How about we build something?
Brilliant! Why didn't I think of that?
Do you have any ideas?
I always do, an entire Notizbuch full of them!
Captain!
Let me guess, the Morganas are back? I'm not surprised... Hannah, why don't we look over your notebook some other day and decide exactly what we're going to do? For now, let's fight!
@BATTLE
All right, so here's the magical Notizbuch of ideas.
That's some very messy magic...
Vergebt mir, Käpt'n, mein Käpt'n! We can't all have the best handwriting!
Ha, as long as the ideas are good...
Which they are! You can flip through them yourself. Does anything pop out at you?

Fields.MenuText: A giant metal horse to give to the Morganas as a gift?
Bigger guns?
An electric horse that can move faster than a car and will bring back the classy horse and carriage era?

Fields.DialogueText: Like the Trojan horse? I thought it might be a good idea. It's not like we've ever tried it before...
It's a fun idea! But we don't want to unbalance me. Also noch mehr!
Not my best idea. I will admit to having drunk a little too much Bier the night I came up with that one.
Wait! What about this one?
Ah, I'd almost forgotten about that one. Perfekt!
So, is it settled?
Jawoll, Käpt'n.
Oh, Captain! Were you just finishing up your meeting? There are Morganas outside that need your attention.
It was very kind of them to wait until after our meeting to attack us. Let's repay them with a good fight!
@BATTLE
Bereit, Käpt'n?
Yes, ma'am! One question, though.
I kind of just tossed it all in this spare room I found.
Thought so. That wasn't a spare room. That was Officer Schneider's quarters.
Ups. Please send my sincerest apologies to him, and I'll transfer the scrap to another room as soon as possible.
That's what I wanted to hear.
Also dann, let's start collecting parts!
Do you really think I know the first thing about what we need?
Nicht so wichtig! Scraps of metal, tools, nuts, bolts, screws... It's the same for every project.

Fields.MenuText: All right, I trust you. You're the expert.
Hannah, are you sure you know what you're doing?
That's it! I'm taking over this project! You don't seem sure of anything.

Fields.DialogueText: I've never been called that before... Jahaa! Ich bin die Expertin!
Hey! Don't question me. I've been doing this for my whole waking life!
Kapitän, you don't trust me enough to know what I'm doing?
Can you at least give me a hint of what exactly I should be looking for, then?
Fine, all right. There are some specific parts I need you to get. I need you to grab...
Captain! ... Damn, it's a mess in here... anyway... Captain! The Morganas are back! We need you, quick!
I wish I could just end it with these Morganas once and for all! Damn it... Come on, Hannah. Let's go.
@BATTLE
I'm so glad to be back to working on our invention. I have to say, it's really captured my interest.
This is quite thrilling!
And the two of us spending time together is always a plus.
Zwei wie Pech und Schwefel!
Somehow, I doubt anyone will actually call us that.
All right, so now I need that wrench, there...
Here, I'll get it for you!
Oh! Huch... my hand kind of touched yours and...

Fields.MenuText: Did it? I... didn't notice.
No, I'm sorry. I should have seen you reach for it.
There's no need to apologize. It's fine, Hannah. I liked it, you know.

Fields.DialogueText: Oh! Well, then... uh... nevermind!
Nein! It's all right! I should have seen you see me reach for it.
Sorry, I'm an awkward duck, sometimes.
Übrigens, your hands are softer than I would have expected from a sailor.
Don't tell the crew. They'll never let me hear the end of it.
Heh, natürlich nicht, Kapitän. Your secret is safe with me.
*ALARM*
Everyone to stations!
@BATTLE
Hannah? We've been working on this for a while now, so is it all right if we take a break?
Eine Pause? Ja, ja, gleich.
If you keep working like that, you're going to tire yourself out. You might even make a mistake.
You think I would make a mistake? Kapitän, this is me you're talking about. Me. I never make mistakes! Niemals!
Hannah... is everything... all right?
Apparently, some of the Mannschaft is saying that my tinkering has ruined the ship. Aber das stimmt nicht! I've only ever made the ship better! I'll prove myself to them...

Fields.MenuText: Who's saying that?! I'll have a discussion with them.
You said "apparently." Do you not know for sure?
Do you need to, uh... cry?

Fields.DialogueText: I'm sure that would go over well.
One of the Mannschaft told me what they had overheard... I guess... maybe I should have checked with some other sources...
Cry? Do I look like the crying type to you, Kapitän?
I want you to know that I believe in you. You are an incredible inventor and an even more incredible person. Don't let anyone on this ship tell you any different.
I don't know what to say... danke, Kapitän.
You don't have to say anything, just... help me fight those incoming Morganas?
Aber natürlich! Mit Vergnügen!
@BATTLE
Everyone get ready for battle!
@BATTLE
Beeilung, Käpt'n! We need to finish! I just need one last Bolzen... and it's done! At long last!
This was definitely one of the more strenuous projects I've ever completed.
Wow... a U-Boot worthy of exploring the Marianengraben. Or at least sneaking through the Ärmelkanal.
This is impressive. Do you really think it would be able to withstand the pressure?
Natürlich! My blueprints are sound, so you can always trust them. Are you ready to take it for a dive?

Fields.MenuText: What?! I thought we were just building this! I'm not actually confident enough that it will run...
Maybe a short trip... I don't want to risk anything.
I'm ready, let's go!

Fields.DialogueText: Even after all the time we spent on it? Es ist quasi unser Kind! Wouldn't you believe in your child?!
Stimmt. Eine Testfahrt, just to see how it works.
I'm glad you're so excited about this! I didn't think you would be that enthusiastic.
We won't be able to go far, of course. We'll conquer the Mariana Trench another day.
Einverstanden. Let's go!
Das war großartig, Kapitän! Can we take the submarine for another dive?
It's as good a time as any. There's a little Morgana situation we have to deal with first, though. To your positions!
@BATTLE
Was?! Oh no, what happened to the U-Boot?!
It was here just a second ago! Did the Morganas wreck it? They're always ruining everything.
Ich fasse es nicht! Mein Projekt... mein Kind... the most impressive thing I've ever made!
Hannah...
Nein! Das darf nicht wahr sein!

Fields.MenuText: Would you like to build another one? We could try again.
I thought you didn't get attached to material objects.
The best thing to do now is just to forget about it. We made it and that's all that matters, right?

Fields.DialogueText: I don't know if I have enough Resourcen for it...
So einfach ist das nicht! It was a symbol of what we could accomplish together and now it's gone!
Forget about something you and I created together? Was?
It was my connection to you, Kapitän. Whenever I was sad or lonely, I could look at that submarine and think of how beautiful it is to create something with you together.
Hannah... I don't want you to be upset.
If you don't care about it, it's fine. Ich muss mich erstmal hinlegen.
There you are, Hannah. Are you still thinking about the submarine?
Kapitän, what do you think is at the bottom of the Marianengraben?

Fields.MenuText: Probably a bunch of rocks and dirt.
Maybe it's got creatures so strange, even our wildest dreams couldn't conjure them up.
What if there is no bottom?

Fields.DialogueText: Yeah... probably... you're so unimaginative!
I'd really be curious to find out what can live in a place so dark and with so much pressure.
*laughs* Don't get like that with me, Kapitän. I could go on about such theories for hours!
You know, the submarine meant a lot to me too. I'm just as upset as you are about it being gone, but I did love working on it with you.
Ich liebe dich auch.
That we did.
Oh, nein! The Nixen are back! I'm not letting them ruin anything else important to me!
Let's get 'em!
@BATTLE
Oh?
Um, I mean that I loved working on it with you, too. We did a great job working on it.
Kapitän?
Gah! What? What's going on?
Entschuldige, I didn't mean to wake you! Go back to sleep, it's nothing.
No, I'm sorry, stay. I'm awake.
I... I had an Alptraum.
Is that really what you came to me for?
Vergiss es. This is really stupid. I'll go.
What was the nightmare about?
I built a Maschine that started killing everyone close to me. Including you.

Fields.MenuText: Well, I can see why you would be troubled.
So, if I died in your dream, does that mean I'll die in real life too?
Sit down, Hannah. You look very shaken.

Fields.DialogueText: I knew you would.
I doubt it... unless it does! Oh Kapitän, please don't die!
It was a really scary dream...
Accidentally killing people is my worst fear. Especially killing you. Oh, are you sure you're all right?
I'm fine, Hannah. I promise. Very alive.
Captain, the Morganas are back! What's our course of action?
Face them, of course! Hannah, can you fight?
Absolut! Auf geht's!
@BATTLE
Hannah! What's that you're working on there?
Häh? Oh, I don't know. It's just a thing I'm tinkering with.
What kind of thing?
A metal thing.
Hannah, you seem a little distracted. Is everything all right?
Ja, ja...

Fields.MenuText: That wasn't very convincing.
Hannah! Snap out of it!
I wear big purple pants and a feather in my cap.

Fields.DialogueText: Wenn du das sagst...
... Was? Mhm.
Oh... Stimmt. Ich auch.
Hannah, we have Morganas approaching. You can fight, right?
Mhm.
I'll take what I can get.
@BATTLE
Everyone prepare for battle! Especially you, Hannah...
@BATTLE
Aha! I got you!
You got me.
Hannah, I'm going to take that hunk of metal away from you if you don't tell me what's wrong right now.
Nichts...
That's it, you lose your metal privileges.
Heh, warte! Don't do that!
Why is that the strongest reaction I've gotten out of you in a while?
Ach, ich weiß auch nicht...

Fields.MenuText: Did I do something to upset you?
Did someone on this ship upset you? I'll fight them if I have to.
Are you really trying to say that nothing's been happening with you?

Fields.DialogueText: Nein, nein...
There doesn't have to be any fighting.
That's not exactly what I'm saying...
So why don't you tell me what has been bothering you?
I'd really rather not... I think I'm going to go back to my cabin now. Can I have my Altmetall back?
Fine...
Danke.
Hannah, can I come in?
Ja... sicher.
I don't know what you've been thinking, but I can't just sit idly by and not do anything when you're so obviously upset.
I don't understand why it matters so much to you.
Because you're important to me. So if there's anything I can do to help--
Do you think that von Siemens was ever lost and confused? Like, he didn't know what direction to go in life?

Fields.MenuText: I'm sure. Everyone's felt like that at some point in their lives.
I don't know about von Siemens, but I certainly have. It's a normal, human feeling.
You think I know anything about von Siemens?

Fields.DialogueText: Do you really think so?
Wie traurig...
I don't know... I guess it was kind of a rhetorical question anyway... Vergiss es.
I've just been feeling lustlos. It's hard to work up the desire to work in the Keller, and when I do, I feel like I mess it all up.
Sometimes it's good to take a break from work, even the stuff you're good at. Otherwise, you'll get burnt out.
I guess I'm just so used to constantly working. That's why I've been carrying that Altmetall with me, but nothing comes of it.
I promise you that what you're feeling is entirely normal. Don't worry.
Captain! Sorry to burst in on you like this, but Morganas are approaching the ship!
Maybe a good battle will clear your head. Let's go!
@BATTLE
Get ready for battle! The Morganas look like they're about to strike.
@BATTLE
Enjoying a little bit of our favorite beer, are we?
Heh, you know me too well, Kapitän.
I've known you for long enough at this point. Why wouldn't I?
Damn, you're right! We have known each other for a while. I'll toast to that! You're such a great... friend.

Fields.MenuText: Oh... friend? Yeah, we're friends.
I'd say I'm more than a friend at this point.
Whatever you say, Hannah.

Fields.DialogueText: Well, what else would we be?
Best friends?
Are you trying to say you're not a good friend?
Let's not talk about this right now. I think you've had a little too much to drink. Let's get you to bed.
So kind... Ich liebe dich.
What?
To bed we go! I also love bed!
I'm only going to tuck you in. Good night, Hannah.
Gute Nacht... zzz...
Hannah, has anyone ever told you that you have a beautiful voice?
Nein! And don't you dare compliment me ever again!
My apologies! What was I ever thinking?!
So can I trust that you'll never, ever say anything nice to me again?
Of course. Unless...
Unless what?

Fields.MenuText: Unless I tell you that you're the best inventor I've ever met.
Unless I tell you that you have the darkest sense of humor of any Belle I know.
Unless I tell you that I thank the stars you're with me?

Fields.DialogueText: Aww... well, if you're going to say nice things like that...
Now that's the kind of compliment a girl like me appreciates!
Aus praktischen Gründen, I suppose, but it's true - you would be lost without me.
Still, you're not always the easiest person to compliment.
That's why I told you not to do it!
Now I would really enjoy some more of your singing.
*ALARM*
You're going to have to cut the concert short.
Typisch.
@BATTLE
Everyone, prepare for battle!
@BATTLE
Hannah! Were you being reckless again?
Nein. Why do you ask?
You look banged up a bit. Let's get you sorted out.
Oh, I don't need silly Pflaster to treat these tiny scratches. Actually, Kapitän, there's been something I've been meaning to ask you. Um... what's your favorite thing about yourself?

Fields.MenuText: I guess I kind of like the way I look.
My personality and intelligence is really nice.
Eh... I don't really like a whole lot about myself.

Fields.DialogueText: Stimmt, mein fescher Kapitän!
You are certainly kind and smart.
Kapitän! Das ist lächerlich! You're an amazing person.
No, no, no. You're just trying to distract me!
So etwas würde ich doch niemals tun. Kapitän, I have to get going now. I promise I'll take care of my wounds.
Uh, don't drip blood everywhere...
Huh? Um...
Get to your battle stations, everyone! The Morganas are back!
@BATTLE
Uh oh...
Kapitän, what's wrong?
Looks like I took some shrapnel. I wonder when that got me...
Kapitän, please let me help you take care of that! I'll help you get to the Sani.

Fields.MenuText: I'm fine, Hannah. I can get there myself.
I would appreciate your help, Hannah. Thank you.
You would never let me help you. Why should I?

Fields.DialogueText: Nein! I'm helping you, and that's final.
Natürlich, Kapitän!
This is different! Just let me help you!
Do you even know the way to sick bay? I can't remember ever seeing you there.
Hey! Don't question me! Come on, we don't want you to bleed out...
Kapitän! Can I come in?
Of course! Thanks for helping me get to sick bay earlier. I appreciate you looking out for me.
Ah, I barely did anything! I'm just happy you recovered so quickly.
With your help.
So was that the worst injury you've ever gotten?

Fields.MenuText: Ha! That scratch? Not by far!
This is definitely the worst! I've never had anything like this happen to me before...
I've sustained injuries like this before. I just hope nothing worse than this ever happens.

Fields.DialogueText: That's... unsettling.
Oh, Kapitän! I hope you didn't experience too much pain...
I hope so, too!
Captain! There are Morganas quickly approaching the ship. We need you!
Keep an eye out for any nasty shrapnel, would you, Hannah?
Mit Vergnügen, Kapitän.
@BATTLE
@BATTLE
Hannah! Oh, good grief! Did you just come from the engine room?
Ja, of course I did. Do I reek of the fumes that badly?
It's not that. You're bleeding profusely from your arm...
Really? Ach. Would you look at that?
You're not more bothered by this?!
Das bisschen Blut? No way! You don't get to my point in life without seeing your fair share of blood. *laughs*

Fields.MenuText: I get so nauseated at the sight of blood. I'm actually starting to feel a little woozy...
That's more than a little blood. I'd call that a gusher.
Believe me, I've seen a lot of blood! I'm just worried that you're hurt.

Fields.DialogueText: Don't pass out on me, Kapitän! I'll go clean it up if it bothers you that much.
Ach was! It's barely more than a drop! Well, maybe it's a little more than that, but I'm fine!
I'm not in any physical pain, so I'm sure it's nothing.
Still, I'm taking you to sick bay.
Kapitän...
We're going.
Na gut...
Another Morgana war patrol. Battle stations!
Hannah! Oh, it looks like you have a tear in the leg of your pants.
Oh, nein! Wie peinlich! Ha! You really think I care about a little tear? I probably have a thousand of those.
My apologies. It's high enough up the leg, I didn't want you to risk... well, finding yourself indecent.
Du liebe Güte! I hope I have not offended any of my precious Mannschaftskameraden. Or given them a stroke.
I'm sure they'd get over it. Actually, you look beautiful, tear and all.
Hey, now. You know how I feel about compliments.

Fields.MenuText: Ah, sorry. I forgot.
Whoops. I "forgot."
That won't stop me giving them.

Fields.DialogueText: Kein Problem, Kapitän.
For some reason, I don't think you're being entirely truthful with me.
Oh, buh.
*ALARM*
Well, Hannah, think you can get through the battle without scandalizing anyone on board?
Meine Güte... Should I make sure not to bend over or lean too far like... this?
@BATTLE
Ha ha ha! That face was herrlich! I can't wait to see you make that face again sometime soon...
Hannah, I can't believe it! You're late!
Bloß 'ne Minute.
A minute?! That's an entire sixty seconds! You're losing your touch, Hannah.
Tja, wo du Recht hast. I apologize for my radical behavior. Why did you want to see me?
Well, it looks like there are some Morganas out prowling right now. Let's get ‘em!
@BATTLE
You know, with the Morganas gone, it's really quite peaceful out, don't you think?
Ja. You know what, Kapitän?
What, Hannah?
Hannah?
You...?
I think you're very good company to have on a peaceful night.
Hmm. I was thinking the same thing.
Sorry to bother you, Captain.  Ma'am.  But do you have five minutes to sign off on a couple of reports?

Fields.MenuText: No.
Whatever it is, just put it in front of me and I'll sign it. No questions asked.
Rescued by paperwork! Thanks for the save, Officer.

Fields.DialogueText: Ha ha ha! Your sense of Humor is getting really good.
Ummm... okay. Here.
Thanks, Captain.
Not now, Officer. Find me tomorrow or something.
Uh... yes, Captain.
What?
I said no.
Glad you got the joke, Hannah. Risky but worth it.
So... the paperwork?
Where were we?
I think we were about to be left alone for awhile and have a very, very, *very* nice night.
Good, but I have to warn you about something.
Which is?
No paperwork or this date is over!
Das fiele mit nicht mal im Traum ein! I think we both have something better in mind, don't we? *kiss*
